author: Tezza Tucker
comment: Have not loaded onto Sony Smartwatch 3. I don't know what you've done on this update, but I'm getting at least 3 days now on my Huawei Watch 2 Sport LTE instead of 2 days. So top marks just for that. I do use other faces but always come back to this one.  Keep up the good work.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi Tezza! 
1) Verify you use the same account on your watch & phone
2) Verify the Android Wear app by Google has the latest update & open it on your phone & make sure you're connected (try toggle bluetoooth off & on if not)
3) Open Settings in the Android Wear app, & tap Resync apps. Wait 3 minutes.
Please contact me at martin@appglobe.com for help

author: Andy Lee
comment: great watch face! i do have a suggestion hopefully you will consider. could you please add brightness controls for ambienrlt mode? i found that displaying just watch hands in ambient mode is still quite bright especially at night. thanks!

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi Andy & thank you for the review!
In my opinion ambient mode brightness is (should be) system settings territory, but as it is now you can only change brightness for both ambient & interactive mode. That will hopefully change.
However, I'll consider your suggestion for a future update, but I can't promise anything.

author: Matthew Hug
comment: Great watch face for the Huawei watch 2. I would like to be able to remove the minute marks if possible in interactive mode. Or at least make them more faint.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thank you for the nice rating, Matthew! Do you mean in interactive mode or ambient mode? Or both? Please contact me (martin@appglobe.com) with some details of your suggestion.

author: Mohamed A.Moniem
comment: The app is great. Why don't you add the email to the features as well as Google Fit? Weather could be added to make it better.  Can I change hours and minutes hand?

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi Mohamed & thanks for the rating!
All of those complications can be added as third party complication if you got a watch with its own little Play Store. Just download for example a weather app from on-watch Play Store & add it's complication via Ksana Settings. The look of hour & minute hands can't be changed, only the second hand.

author: Cody C.
comment: Five stars because it does what it claims. It doesn't do everything under the sun, but it does the basic things that someone needs. And it's not a battery killer. Good job!

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thank  you Cody!

comment: The best watch face so far. Really like the customization part

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thank you very much! Very nice to hear you like the customizations. Been trying to keep a good balance between ease of use & customization.

author: Tim Coker
comment: Easy to set up watchface. Setup time less than 5 minutes.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Nice to hear that, Tim! And thank you for the nice rating :-)

author: Viktor Kuzov
comment: Amazing watch face. One of my favourite. Everything working smooth,the design is awesome. Keep it good work.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thank you Viktor! Glad to hear it works as it should :-)

comment: I get a lot of use out of it"it's nice ..!

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Glad you find it useful, and thank you for the nice rating!

author: Lee Nelson Jr.
comment: App works fine... Watch face won't install.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi Lee, please contact me (only 350 characters allowed here).
Found the cause (bug while pushing SMS to the watch, happens on one device only!). Fixed in v 1.1.9 (please update).

About your general problem with watch faces, please update your System software [offered my help, 
but so far you won't let me   :-( ].

/  martin@appglobe.com

author: KickMeElmo
comment: Easily my favorite watch face thus far. Allows swapping complications around without entering configuration and has five positions to use without seeming overcrowded. Very low battery impact as well.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Thank you for the nice review KickMeElmo :-).
Nice to hear you like it! 
Happy Holidays / Martin

author: Steven Butler
comment: Fantastic looking watch face, with plenty of customisation options. Lovely clean appearance and the ability to pull stats from Google Fit straight to the watch face is exactly what I was looking for. Developer also appears to be very active judging from the level of correspondence within the reviews. Excellent work, great to see for Android Wear!

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thank you Steven for the nice review! Glad to hear you like the looks & customisations.

comment: Really like this watch face. The only thing I can't manage to do is to adjust (down) the ambient mode brightness.  Can this be added?

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi & thank you for the review!
In my opinion ambient mode brightness is system settings territory, but as it is now you can only change brightness for both ambient & interactive mode. Hopefully that will change.
Anyway, I'll consider your suggestion for a future update, but I can't promise anything.

Happy New Year!

author: The Tech Librarian
comment: Love how customizable it is works great Update * after using the face for a few weeks it hands down is the best face I have ever used.i would like a few more symbols to pick for the top area of the watch would be great.using ZTE quartz

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Glad to hear that! And thank you for the nice rating TTL :-)

author: Martin Carr
comment: My favourite watch face. Good ambient options so low on battery and easy to change complications. It's clean and easy to read and compliments the Huawei W2 very well. Thanks

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thank  you Martin, glad to hear it works as it should on your Huawei 2!

comment: Great watch face. I wished though it had an option to get more things in colour when in ambient mode. e.g the hour indicators and/or the hands.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thanks for the nice rating! Most of the watch face is black in ambient mode since black pixels is the same as switched off pixels on amoled screens. This is good for battery life. Anyway, I'll consider your suggestion for a future update.

author: Chris A
comment: Loved this app, was my go too watch face for months but noticed my bluetooth connection on my huawei watch 2 was constantly dropping out and my google voice activation stopped working. Thought this was a watch or wear 2.0 issue and factory reset the watch and removed all wear apps from my phone and started again. Seemed to be ok for the first few hours then bluetooth disconnected again and again. Tried deleting different apps from my watch. Then as a last ditch attempt thought id uninstall this app. Worked a treat after that, even tried reinstalling ksana again and low a behold started disconnecting bluetooth randomly. So I deleted Ksana again and been fine for days no bluetooth issues for days now. Like I say loved this app but the bluetooth dropping really got on my nerves.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi Chirs, I'm sorry to hear about your disconnection problems. I am, however, pretty sure it cannot be because of Ksana. It is simply not possible, got zero control over the Bluetooth connection. 
Anyway, I might be able to help find out the cause if you contact me at martin@appglobe.com (limited space here, only 350 characters allowed).

author: vishnu chandar
comment: The best free watch face! The one every AW user must have. If the dials are also customisable it would be awesome. And the clock scales and the hands too could be customisable

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Hi vishnu & thanks you! Both for the nice  rating & the feedback. I'll consider your suggestions.

author: Charles Ward
comment: Looks nice but unable to adjust the top content area.   Selecting for the smaller one does nothing and the larger one isn't available.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Hi Charles! Not sure I get what you mean. Please contact me (martin@appglobe.com) with some details, limited space here, only 350 characters. / Martin

comment: I've looked though loads of watch faces but this just always sets the bar. Easily the best one I've used. Clean, informative and easy to configure.

comment: One of the nicest faces I've used. Great customisations and the chosen 'complications' can be tapped to zoom in.

reply.content: Thank you Phil! Glad you like t he customisations & the tap to expand interactivity. (Tip: to trigger a complication action directly you can double tap instead of single tap.)

author: Mikko Yrttiaho
comment: Whew it installed finally last night. Seemed like a Android Wear app bug. Excellent!

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Hmm strange...nowadays the download to the watch is done automatically by Google Play on your phone for Wear 1 watches. I know Google previously had some problems with this, but I thought it was fixed now. Please contact me (martin@appglobe.com) so I can help you with this. Limited space here, only 355 characters.

author: Vasudevan Srinivasan
comment: Great watch face that allows me to customize a lot of features. I can add additional services through provider interface. I love this app. Excellent product.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thanks you Vasudevan, very glad to hear you like it!

author: Kelby Karcher
comment: It would be perfect if I could get the temperature on it. Other than that it's everything I want.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: If you got Wear 2.0 (i.e. if your watch has its own tiny little Play Store) you can get temperature or any other weather related data by adding a complication via a third-party app. Please contact me (martin@appglobe.com) if you need any help.

author: Razvan Antonesi
comment: Very good watch face. As a sugestion it would be nice to have a lockscreen button.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Hi Razvan & thank you for the  nice rating!
Not sure I get what you mean. A button to lock or unlock the screen? Unlock with a pattern? Please give me some details to martin@appglobe.com.

author: Damian Danik
comment: This is the best watch face app I've seen so far.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thanks Damian, glad to hear that :-)!

author: bobby kirkwood
comment: Great face no weather content though

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Thanks bobby!
If your watch got its own tiny little Play Store you can add weather via a complication. E.g. AccuWeather, Weather Channel, or Google's own complication (uses weather.com). After installed via on-watch Play Store, just choose Provider for any content area in Ksana settings & choose a complication.  Happy holidays!

author: Adam Joseph Tuma
comment: Great app. Lots of custom settings.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thanks Adam :-), glad you like the customization options!

comment: Nice

author: Jonathan Treasure
comment: Very cool watch face. I particularly like the complication that displays both watch AND phone battery. The only way it could be better, would be if it could be set so that tapping a complication once took you immediately to a shortcutted app instead of first taking you to an ugly mini menu.

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thanks Jonathan :-)  You can double tap to immediately trigger a complication action. Anyway, by making complications expandable you get readable or more content + access to optional shortcuts.

author: Mandar Wadekar
comment: The watch face is perfect. It looks beautiful no doubt. The only thing that i don't like are the watch backgrounds. Please add some good backgrounds to the watch face it would look amazing!

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the nice rating  Mandar!
I've used very similar backgrounds (all very dark) since this is better for battery life. However (on Wear 2.0), if you choose "Provider" at the bottom of the background list you can choose a third-party complication. But be warned that lighter backgrounds  will give you worse battery life :-).

comment: Everything is good but I feel the romans colour only in White. If you provide the option to change the outer line colour to different then this app is awesome.. Try to give it on next update.. Thanks... Highly recommend...

reply.author: appglobe.com
reply.content: Thanks Dinesh, I'll consider your suggestion.
